alert.note: Alert for Central Highlands; De Baca County; Eastern San Miguel County; Guadalupe County; Northeast Highlands; Roosevelt County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued December 22 at 9:55PM MST until December 23 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 5 to 15 degrees below zero, except as low as 22 below in northern San Miguel County. * WHERE...Central Highlands, De Baca County, Guadalupe County, Roosevelt County, Eastern San Miguel County, and Northeast Highlands. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Wind chill values may fall to extremely dangerous levels. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate winter clothing, including a hat, and gloves. Insulate exterior pipes, and ensure adequate heat reaches inside cabinets and closets where interior pipes exist. Protect pets and livestock, and ensure their drinking water does not freeze.

area.areaDesc: Central Highlands; De Baca County; Eastern San Miguel County; Guadalupe County; Northeast Highlands; Roosevelt County
